trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 29th 2013
Summary: 5-8 bright Orange orb lights over New York City skyline
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband was driving us home and I was in the back and I noticed 5-6 bright orange orbs over the New York City skyline. It wasn't hard to miss because they were bigger than the stars. We also saw planes around the same area where the orange orbs appeared and there was a difference with the lights. My husband then pulled over into the driveway and we stared at the sky and noticed the orange orbs slowly changing position and some orbs disappearing and reappearing. My husband grabbed our camera took a picture and the orange orbs slowly disappeared.
